articles.title: Volkswagen stops car production in Russia and suspends shipments - CNN
articles.description: Russia has ramped up assaults on key Ukrainian cities, as President Zelensky pleads for more international assistance and a second round of talks between Ukraine and Russia are set to take place. Follow here for live news updates from on the ground in Ukraine.
articles.content:
